title: Calories in Birria Tacos
meta_description: Learn calories in birria tacos with full nutrition breakdown per taco, totals for 3, macros, and tweaks for beef-filled Mexican street food.
assumptions: 3 beef birria tacos: each with 6-inch corn tortilla, 2 oz shredded beef birria, 0.5 oz Oaxaca cheese, onions, cilantro; no consomé included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, meat cut, cheese amount, frying method, and toppings. Check restaurant info or labels when available.

quick_answer.text: Three birria tacos provide ~840 kcal and ~45 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use chicken birria instead of beef per taco
Flour tortilla instead of corn per taco

faqs.q: How many calories in one birria taco?
faqs.a: About 280 kcal per taco under standard assumptions.

faqs.q: What are the macros for birria tacos?
faqs.a: Per 3 tacos: ~45 g protein, 60 g carbs, 45 g fat.

faqs.q: Do birria tacos have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, ~1500 mg for 3 tacos due to seasoning and cheese.

faqs.q: How does frying affect calories in birria tacos?
faqs.a: Dipped and fried in fat adds ~50-100 kcal per taco versus steamed.

faqs.q: Can birria tacos be lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes—skip cheese, use leaner meat, or smaller tortillas to reduce by 100-200 kcal total.
